output:
{
  "nodes": [
    {
      "id": "node-0",
      "label": "Productivity-Wage Compact Fracture",
      "summary": "The historical link between productivity gains and wage growth is broken by AI-driven efficiency.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 0,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-1",
      "label": "Macroeconomic Divergence (K-Shaped Economy)",
      "summary": "AI productivity lifts GDP while labor share collapses, creating a bifurcated wealth distribution.",
      "depth": 9.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 1,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.95
    },
    {
      "id": "node-2",
      "label": "Productivity Paradox & Wage Stagnation",
      "summary": "Soaring productivity in AI-exposed sectors does not translate into broad wage increases.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 2,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-3",
      "label": "Silent Firing & Attrition Strategy",
      "summary": "Employers induce voluntary turnover and close unfilled roles to reduce headcount without layoff headlines.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 3,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-4",
      "label": "Middle Management Flattening (Agentic Organization)",
      "summary": "AI reporting and orchestration eliminate middle managers, expanding spans of control.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 4,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-5",
      "label": "Agentic Workforce & Superagency",
      "summary": "Single humans, augmented by autonomous AI agents, can execute entire departmental workflows.",
      "depth": 9.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 5,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.95
    },
    {
      "id": "node-6",
      "label": "Sector Displacement Overview",
      "summary": "AI reshapes employment across industries, creating a geography of risk and refuge.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 6,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.80
    },
    {
      "id": "node-7",
      "label": "Tech Sector Cannibalization",
      "summary": "Software engineers and prompt engineers face massive reductions as AI automates coding and design.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 7,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-8",
      "label": "BPO Shockwave & Geopolitical Impact",
      "summary": "Call centers and outsourcing hubs in the Philippines and India confront massive job loss.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 8,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-9",
      "label": "Professional Services Decline",
      "summary": "Legal and financial junior roles collapse as AI performs document review, research, and modeling.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 9,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-10",
      "label": "Creative Industries Commoditization",
      "summary": "Illustrators and translators lose work as generative AI produces acceptable content at near-zero cost.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 10,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-11",
      "label": "Healthcare & Construction as Sanctuaries",
      "summary": "Physical, regulated, or chaotic domains remain relatively insulated from immediate AI replacement.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 11,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.80
    },
    {
      "id": "node-12",
      "label": "Entry Pipeline Collapse (GenAI Divide)",
      "summary": "Graduate hiring dries up as AI handles tasks previously earmarked for on‑the‑job training.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 12,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-13",
      "label": "AI Precariat & Identity Crisis",
      "summary": "Workers experience chronic insecurity and psychological strain as their occupational identity erodes.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 13,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-14",
      "label": "Policy Responses & Regulatory Lag",
      "summary": "Governments struggle to regulate AI’s labor impact, leading to fragmented and delayed interventions.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 14,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-15",
      "label": "Universal Basic Income Discussion",
      "summary": "UBI emerges as a potential social safety net to sustain consumption in a job‑scarce economy.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 15,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.80
    },
    {
      "id": "node-16",
      "label": "Worst‑Case Scenarios (Technological Unemployment)",
      "summary": "Persistent structural unemployment and social unrest loom if no redistributive policies succeed.",
      "depth": 9.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 16,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.95
    }
  ],

    "trajectory": "The narrative moves from the breakdown of the productivity‑wage compact, through macro‑economic divergence and silent displacement, into AI‑driven organizational flattening and sectoral cannibalization, culminating in a precarious labor precariat and policy debates that may determine whether technological unemployment becomes a societal crisis.",
